EmailTemplate.description: [External] Getting back to business - Self cashed
EmailTemplate.name: Getting Back to business_Self Cashed
EmailTemplate.subject: Getting back to business
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Getting back to business!
Dear Valued Customer
We are excited to see that COVID-19 restrictions are lifting, and businesses can reopen their doors! Cardtronics is invested in ensuring that we provide the support that you need to get your ATM ready as soon as possible. Our team are here to help where we can. Below are a few easy steps to ensure that your ATM is fully functional and ready to go before your business reopens. We want to help you ‘Get back to business.’
SELF-CASHED SITES
If you need receipt rolls or promotional materials for your ATM click the link below to contact us
CLICK HERE TO ORDER MATERIALS
Copyright © 2021 NCR Corporation, Cardtronics Division, All rights reserved. You are viewing this email because you are a contact of the Cardtronics business. Our mailing address is: 87 Corporate Drive Heatherton VIC 3202
Want to change how you receive these emails? You can update your preferences or unsubscribe from this list.
